Entries.Jasper_Breathe: Do not fret. I am just taking a moment to compose myself... The dark, the earth... it still haunts me, @.
Entries.Jasper_Read: Oh, hello there @! I was just reading about the lore of Stardew Valley. But I shan't bore you with details, I'm sure you've better things to do than listen to me rabbit on.$1
...oh, that's a ridiculous claim! There's no evidence to support it whatsover! Oh, hello @, sorry. Just reading the works of the 'esteemed' Professor Peasbody.$5
...oh, I suppose... I admit it... There is some value in your claim. Oh hello @. Sorry! I was just reading Cameron's latest 'epiphanies'.$1
Nothing like indulging in a bit of light reading on a cold winter day. It's my guilty pleasure.
Hello @! Have you read Mr. Elliot's book? The writing style is somewhat unsophisticated, but it is quite the page turner!
Greetings @! I am delving into this fascinating perspective on the Gotoran conflict.
Ah, foul weather is a fine excuse to undertake some 'research', don't you think?$1
Ah, foul weather is a fine excuse to undertake some 'research', don't you think? Okay, I confess. It is one of Gunther's paperbacks.$3

Changes.LogName: Removes Jasper from Festivals when he is AWOL

Entries.Jasper: The sound of rain upon the roof is so restful, don't you think? A good, do very little kind of day.

Changes.LogName: Jasper has a crush on farmer Dialogue

Entries.refusal_knownA: Oh! This is very sudden... I... I care for you a lot, @. But... can we move a bit slower, please?$2#$b#You might grow tired of me yet!$4
Entries.refusal_knownB: Oh, my mind is all a buzz... Not so long ago I was married to my research. Please, give me a little more time.$2
Entries.refusal_botherA: I need a little more time to consider this. And what it means. Sorry.$2
Entries.refusal_botherB: Oh, @. Why are you so determined to shackle yourself to an old fool like me? I care for you deeply, but please be patient.$4

Entries.Jasper0: I still cannot believe you really want to marry me! Oh, @! I shall be honored to be your husband.$4#$b#Everything's under control! No need to fret!$1
Entries.Jasper1: Oh @. I am so excited for us to be starting a life together. I love you, you know.$4

Entries.funLeave_Jasper: #$c 0.5#Good morning, my love! What shall I teach the children about today? Penny prefers me to discuss geology... but Vincent loves stories about the goblins.$3#Today I intend to teach the children about fossilization. However, I fear my careful prepared lesson shall be swiftly derailed.$3
Entries.funReturn_Jasper: #$c 0.5#Oh phew, I'm exhausted. Who would have known children would ask so many questions?#There's something very fulfilling about teaching, @. Although it certainly helps that the children are quite a delight!$3

#$c 0.5#It seems foolish, I know, for a grown man to be scared of the dark. But every rustle in the leaves, every footstep. I know it is irrational, my love, but I cannot halt the fear.$2#Ah, a pleasant day spent catching up with old friends. Marlon sends his regards, @. Oh, and I picked up this 'shiny pebble' for you as well.[62 64 66 68]$1

Entries.funLeave_Jasper: #$c 0.5#Its a rough walk up the mountain, but it is certainly worth it.$k#$e#I still cannot believe that I shall be taking tea with one of the Smoluanu!#Have a splendid day, my love.$1
Entries.funReturn_Jasper: #$c 0.5#Oh, so many new revelations! My mind is quite abuzz with inspiration, @. I might need some help getting to sleep tonight!$1#Our friend sent me home with this... They were insistent. Please be careful with it, my love.$2[286 287 288]

Entries.OneKid_0: What story shall I read to %kid1 today? I've been digging through the fairy tales... but they're all so very Grimm, don't you think?$3
Entries.OneKid_1: Little %kid1 is beautiful. They must take after you, my love.
Entries.OneKid_2: I gave %kid1 one of my crystals today - it is never too early to encourage a love of geology.#$b#Alas, %kid1 did not seem very impressed.
Entries.OneKid_3: So much of my life I dedicated to research, but when I look at our beautiful family...#$b#I'm so glad you guided me down another path, @.

Entries.Jasper_Peasbody1: Hello farmer,^We've never met, but I'm reaching out to you because I'm concerned about our mutual friend, Prof. Jasper Thomas. He's a hot-headed fanatic, and I've heard rumors that he's gone off into the caves following a 'white rabbit' - and, in all likelihood, got himself killed. Despite what I'm sure he's told you (since we parted rather unamicably), I've never wished harm upon him. But then again... he was always a bit of a stubborn fool, and never inclined to leave well alone what should be left alone!^I'm sorry, this isn't a threat! It's merely an expression of concern. Please, if you've found him - alive or dead - I'd appreciate you letting me know. Because we were friends once and, truth be told, I still care for the pig-headed fool.^^Regards, ^Professor Cameron Peasbody.[#]Peasbody's Letter
Entries.Jasper_Home: Greetings @,^I am truly indebted to you. That you would find me, and bring me home. Or what is left of me. The infection has left me a shadow of my former self, and the injury was as dire as I feared... I hope it shall not come as too much as a shock to you, my friend.^^I shall be home within the next few days, into what Gunther has uncharitably labelled "house arrest". I suspect I shall achieve a great deal of writing, and possibly some reading too.^^Your company would, as always, be greatly appreciated.^^Best wishes, Jasper. %item conversationTopic TalkJasperHome 7 %% [#]Jasper is home.
Entries.Jasper_Home1: Dear @.^House arrest is starting to get tiresome. I miss the scent and the sound of the forest. I am becoming more adept with the wheelchair now, but alas it is problematic ascending and descending the stairs - for which Gunther has been very courteous in assisting - and once outside the ground proves treacherous and uneven. I am practicising my exercises every morning and evening, like a dutiful student, in the hope that soon I shall be at least somewhat mobile once more.^^Yours truly, Jasper.[#]Jasper's correspondence 1.
Entries.Jasper_HomeA: Greetings and salutations!^I hope things are going well for you on the farm, @, and that you are not yet weary of my correspondence. I have precious few friends in this world, and I do not wish to trouble them.^Speaking of friends - may I dare to think? - I penned a missive to Peasbody and received a swift response! It appears, perhaps, that a visit may be imminent.^^Yours fondly, Jasper.[#]Jasper and Peasbody.
Entries.Jasper_Picnic: My dear friend,^ I have discovered the most magical place! Please meet me near the statue of 'Old Man Cannoli' over the noon-time period on the next sunny day. You might like to bring your swimwear!^^Fondest regards, Jasper.[#]Invitation to a picnic
Entries.Jasper_LoveLetter: Dearest @,^ Some have claimed I have a way with words... others that I am too flowery for my own good. I have tried to capture my feelings for you in words. Even written poetry like our friend Elliot (it was very bad, no, you cannot see it). I cannot describe how what we have makes my heart feel lighter, and my soul soar. How much the sight of your smile makes me feel alive...^I guess, what I am saying is... I love you, @.^^Yours, now and forever, Jasper. %item conversationTopic JasperEngaged 2 %%[#]A Love Letter from Jasper
Entries.Gunther_Letter: Jasper and @,^Hope all's going well for you both, and that Jasper hasn't dug up your farm looking for artifacts yet!^I'm glad that you found each other. Anyhow, I was tidying up around the place, and found something that reminded me of Jasper, so I thought he might like it.^Take care, both of you, and don't be strangers!^^Regards, Gunther.%item object 563 1 %%[#]A gift from Gunther
Entries.Gunther_Letter2: Jasper and @,^Hope all is going well for you both, and that Jasper hasn't dug up your farm looking for artifacts yet!^I hear you are expecting a new family member and, since I've heard kids can be quite expensive, thought I'd send you a little gift.^^Thank you, both of you, for all you've done for my museum.^^Take care, both of you, and don't be strangers!^^Regards Gunther.%item conversationTopic FarmerPregnantJasper 14 %%item money 1000 %%[#]A Gift from Gunther
Entries.Jasper_BabyArrives: Dear @,^^Might I say how delighted my father and I were to hear your news and to welcome our first grandchild into the world. We hope one day to be able to visit, but until then, we send our love.^^Love, Mom and Dad.%item conversationTopic Jasper_BabySleep 14 %%[#]A letter from Mom and Dad
Entries.Jasper_BabyCrawling: Dear Jasper,^I know that we've had our differences in the past, but I wanted to send you my congratulations.^I cannot believe that you, a man so dedicated to his work, would settle down and become a family man.^I am pleased that you have found your happiness.^^I do miss our friendship, you know...^With my dearest regards and deepest regrets, Cameron. %item conversationTopic Jasper_BabyCrawler 28 %%[#]A letter from Cameron
Entries.Jasper_Todd: JOJA PROTEKT TODDLER GATES!^^Keep your children contained with JoJa's patented Protekt Toddler gates, guaranteed to keep the kids out of harm's way while you go about your day!^^Available now from your local JojaMart, only 1500g![#]Junk Mail from JoJa

Entries.Jasper_HomeB: Hello @!^Apologies for my melancholic mood earlier. I find my outlook much improved, for I have just received excellent news. My wound has healed fully, thus I am to be fitted with a prosthetic. I will become bionic man! Ah, I jest, but it will be good to get back on my own two - well, one - foot again.^Anyway. I trust all is well with you, and maybe hope that one day soon I shall be able to visit your farm once more. For even though the mines may now be denied me, there is still so much of this world left to explore.^^Fare thee well, Jasper.[#]Jasper's Prosthetic.

Hello @!^Apologies for my melancholic mood earlier. Memories of that night still haunt me. But I am seeing someone about them, so do not fear for me.^I trust all is well with you, and maybe hope that one day soon I shall be able to visit your farm once more. For even though the mines may now be denied me, there is still so much of this world left to explore.^^Fare thee well, Jasper.[#]Jasper's Melancholy.

Oh... where are my glasses?$12"/pause 500/emote farmer 24/pause 500/emote Jasper 12/pause 500/fade/warp Jasper 39 16 0/showFrame Jasper 35/fade unfade/pause 500/emote Jasper 28/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/showFrame Jasper 34/speak Jasper "They've gone, @. Gone!$13"/speed farmer 3/move farmer -1 0 2/speed farmer 5/move farmer 0 3 1/move farmer 12 0 1/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Jasper "All my notes... my research about the dwarves... They've been taken!$13"/pause 500/emote farmer 16/pause 500/speak Jasper "Who would do such a thing?$13"/quickQuestion #Perhaps it was a dwarf?#Maybe goblins?#I bet it was Peasbody!#You definitely left them on the table?(break)pause 500\speak Jasper "Do you really think so? Perhaps they do not want to be found.$13"(break)pause 500\speak Jasper "That seems ... not impossible. But goblins leave a lingering scent behind them - of dead leaves and decay. Cameron would never seek to harm me in that manner.$12|I know that you and Peasbody do not see eye-to-eye, my love, but this seems underhanded, even for him.$13^I know that you and Peasbody do not see eye-to-eye, my love, but this seems underhanded, even for her.$13"(break)pause 500\emote Jasper 12\speak Jasper "Please do not make me doubt my memories. Entries.55990004/e 55990002/f Dwarf 25/A DwarfVi: sappypiano/12 16/farmer 9 14 0 Jasper -100 -100 0/skippable/pause 500/playSound woodyStep/pause 500/playSound doorOpen/pause 500/warp Jasper 12 20/faceDirection farmer 2/emote farmer 32/speak Jasper "Good morning my love! I'm pleased to see you are awake. I hope I didn't disturb you.#$b#Sleep, once again, evaded me."/emote farmer 16/speed farmer 5/move farmer 3 0 2/move Jasper 0 -2 0/speak Jasper "The nightmares, yes. I needed to feel fresh air against my skin."/pause 500/move Jasper 1 0 3/speak Jasper "I found something, @."/addObject 12 18 102 0/pause 500/jump farmer 2/speed farmer 3/move farmer 0 3 2/pause 500/speak Jasper "It's my journal. I found it on the doorstep. With this tucked inside:"/pause 500/faceDirection Jasper 0/Message "Waep ahuaiit sapocahis opi uapchgiss, hemot sahyop, waep uetapotai obmupozgi. Ud wae uush ca itau chi cpech. Aami oc mubtuehc, utca chi Kachip's maech."/pause 500/speak Jasper "It's Dwarvish... An invitation, I think... to meet, at midnight, within the entrance to the mines.#$b#But who could have written it? The dwarves?$3#$b#What if it's a trick?$2"/pause 500/faceDirection Jasper 3/pause 500/faceDirection Jasper 0/speak Jasper "No, that's ridiculous. Cameron would never stoop that low, even when he sought to discredit me.^No, that's ridiculous. Cameron would never stoop that low, even when she sought to discredit me.#$b#And we have moved beyond that."/pause 500/speak Jasper "Will you come with me, @? I feel a fool for admitting it... that I, a grown man, a scientist, am scared of the dark. But I will feel much stronger with you by my side."/emote farmer 32/emote Jasper 20/pause 1000/end

Entries.55990005/e 55990004/t 2330 2500/w sunny: nightTime/60 7/Jasper 58 7 3 farmer 43 10 1 Dwarf -1000 -1000 2/addConversationTopic JasperMeetsDwarf 7/addMailReceived Dwarf_Friend/skippable/pause 500/move Jasper -4 0 0/pause 500/emote Jasper 28/pause 500/move Jasper -4 0 3/pause 500/shake Jasper 240/pause 500/move Jasper 4 0 0/pause 500/emote Jasper 40/pause 500/move farmer 0 -3 1/emote farmer 56/pause 500/faceDirection Jasper 3/emote Jasper 20/move farmer 7 0 1/pause 500/speak Jasper "My love, I'm so glad to see you... I tried to be brave and come by myself... I feel like a fool.$2#$b#What if it is all a prank? I have heard that Sam is quite the prankster.$1#$b#Although I do not imagine that he would be able to write in Dwarvish.#$b#What if the monsters are waiting for me? No... oh no...$2#$b#Oh, I'm sorry, @. I'm babbling. Nervous. Thank you for meeting me.$5"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 500/showFrame Jasper 33/pause 500/showFrame Jasper 32/pause 1500/showFrame Jasper 33/pause 500/speak Jasper "I am ready now. Let us enter."/faceDirection Jasper 0/move farmer 3 0 0/move Jasper 0 -2 0/fade/stopMusic/viewport -100 -100/warp Jasper 30 8/warp farmer 32 8/warp Dwarf 43 6/changeLocation Mine/viewport 37 8/playMusic Upper_Ambient/advancedMove Jasper false 10 0/move farmer 8 0 1/move farmer 0 1 1/pause 1500/move Dwarf 0 2 3 true/speak Dwarf "Greetings sundwellers."/pause 500/showFrame Jasper 4/jump Jasper 3/pause 500/emote Jasper 16/speak Jasper "I know you! You... you found me in the caves... when I was broken and alone... you fed me powdered mushrooms...$2"/pause 500/speak Jasper "You saved my life!$4"/pause 500/emote Dwarf 60/pause 500/speak Jasper "And all the time... you were.... you are...$2"/pause 500/shake Jasper 240/move Dwarf -1 0 3/move Dwarf 0 1 3/pause 1000/faceDirection Dwarf 3/pause 500/emote Dwarf 8/pause 500/speak Dwarf "Your mate seems somewhat... unsettled. I haven't broken him, have I?"/emote farmer 28/quickQuestion #He's just overcome.#He's embarrassing me!#You're a dwarf, right?(break)pause 500\speak Dwarf "Overcome at meeting me? Humans are such strange, emotional beings."(break)pause 500\emote Jasper 12\pause 500\speak Jasper "My apologies, @. I did not mean to become an embarrassment.$5"(break)pause 500\speak Dwarf "Dwarf is what humans call us, yes. It'll do as well as any."/pause 500/speak Jasper "My apologies. It was a bit of a shock to realize I had already met the one I sought so ardently.$3#$b#It is an honor to meet you. I am Professor Jasper Thomas.$1"/move Dwarf 0 -1 3/pause 500/speak Dwarf "Humans offer their names so freely, I'm afraid I'm a little more attached to mine. I hope Dwarf will suffice."/pause 500/faceDirection Dwarf 1/pause 500/emote Dwarf 40/pause 500/faceDirection Dwarf 3/playMusic sappypiano/speak Dwarf "I'm sorry I borrowed your notes. But I was afraid, Professor Jasper Thomas.#$b#I was afraid you'd sell our secrets to any who wanted to know them.#$b#But I've been watching you. And I no longer believe you would."/textAboveHead Jasper "Watching Me?"/pause 3000/emote Dwarf 60/pause 1500/emote Jasper 40/pause 1500/speak Jasper "So you will teach me? You will help me correct the errors in my papers? For my own peace of mind, if nothing more.$3"/speak Dwarf "No, Professor Jasper Thomas, I won't. I can't"/pause 500/textAboveHead Jasper "Oh...."/pause 500/speak Jasper "I understand. I am sorry for prying too deep into what I would not - should not - understand.$2#$b#I am grateful to have met you, regardless. And thank you, for saving my life.$4"/pause 500/faceDirection Jasper 2/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/speak Jasper "We should go, @, and permit Dwarf the privacy they require.$2"/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection Jasper 3/speak Dwarf "No, Jasper Thomas, you don't understand."/jump Jasper 3/faceDirection Jasper 1/pause 500/speak Dwarf "I can't teach you... because I don't know myself."/emote Jasper 16 true/emote farmer 16 true/speak Dwarf "My sire told tales of the father and the mother - the sun and the earth.#$b#Of the shadowkin in the deep and the elemental wars. They taught me how to make bombs, how to cook. And who not to trust.#$b#But everything I know, everything I remember, it's all jumbled and confused.#$b#And now they are gone. I took your notes because I hoped they'd help me learn who I really was, but..."/pause 500/speak Jasper "...They were just chicken scratches on paper?$2"/pause 500/emote Dwarf 60/speak Dwarf "I was hoping, perhaps, that you could teach me, Jasper Thomas. As you teach the human cubs.#$b#That maybe we could learn the secrets of the dwarves... together?"/pause 500/emote Dwarf 28/pause 500/emote Jasper 16/speak Dwarf "And you could, perhaps, not share them with the world."/emote Jasper 32/speak Jasper "It would be my pleasure."/pause 500/emote Dwarf 32/pause 500/message "Jasper could be some time. Perhaps it's time to head home?"/pause 1000/end invisible Jasper

Entries.Jasper_Teach: I'm so glad Professor Jasper's going to be teaching us! I've got so many questions for him.$1
Entries.ArchaeologyHouse_Wed: #$c 0.8#Hello farmer! Professor Jasper's teaching us about gemstones! There's one called a fairy stone. It sounds really pretty!#Did you know there's a type of stone made of lava? It's called obsidian, and it's really pretty!
Entries.summer_Wed_inlaw_Jasper: I hope Professor Jasper still comes to see us now he's living with you. I've been collecting lots of stones to show him!
Entries.summerBeach6: I found a pretty rock! Do you think Professor Jasper might like it?$3#$b#He's super smart, and answers ALL my questions. Even the ones Miss Penny says it's rude to ask.$1
Entries.fall_Wed8: Professor Jasper looks like a wizard, doesn't he? Like he could teach you stuff in a magic school.$4#$b#He wrote some of the books in the library, you know!$1
Entries.JasperEngaged: You and Professor Jasper are getting married! It's so exciting.$1#$b#Hey, are you gonna have kids? I'll help look after them!
Entries.Jasper_BabyCrawler: Can I come and visit you on the farm please? I'd really like to meet %kid1.$3#$b#I'll be careful, I promise!$1

Entries.Jasper_Teach: I hope Mr Professor tells us all about the goblins. I hear they eat slugs and worms on toast for breakfast!$1
Entries.ArchaeologyHouse_Wed: Hehe! There's a rock called schist! Schist!$3
Entries.summer_Wed_inLaw_Jasper: Professor Jasper tells really cool stories about the goblins when Miss Penny's not listening.$1#$b#They're so gross! It's awesome. I hope I get to meet one someday!
Entries.JasperEngaged: @ and Prof Jasper up a tree! K-I-S-S-I-N-G!$1

Entries.Jasper_Teach: Oh @, isn't it exciting? A renowned professor has offered to teach the children?$3#$b#Maybe I'll learn something myself!$4
Entries.JasperEngaged: Congratulations on your engagement. When I first met Jasper, he seemed so studious and distant.#$b#But he's so good with the kids! I'm sure you'll be very happy together.

Entries.JasperHurt: I can't break confidentiality, but I can reassure you that Jasper survived his surgery and is likely to recover.#$b#A full recovery? Ah, I think it's best you speak to him yourself.$2
Entries.JasperEnagaged: I hear you are marrying the Professor. Congratulations to you both.[348]$1

Entries.ArchaeologyHouse_Wed: #$c 0.7#Professor Jasper's knows heaps of stuff! I've read his books! Did you know he lived with the goblins? They sound cool, but also quite scary. I'm not sure I'd ever wanna meet one.#Hello farmer @! Did you know that...#$b#%Eloise shares her _extensive_ new knowledge on gemstones with you.
Entries.JasperEngaged: You're marrying our Professor! Did you know he was once engaged to a goblin?#$b#Maybe you should ask him about that!$1

NPC Gift Tastes - Dwarf loves milk

Entries.spouseRoom_Jasper: $1 Yellow_scroll#I was doing some tidying and uncovered this, @. I thought it might be fun for us to learn Dwarvish together. I know, it's silly, but we could have our own secret language![99]$4$k#$e#I was doing some tidying and uncovered this, @. I thought it might be fun for us to learn Dwarvish together.$1[98 97 96]

Entries.Outdoor_2: My sleep still troubles me, my love. The early morning walks help to ease some of the stiffness from these old bones.
Entries.Outdoor_3: The animals seem unsettled this morning, @. I feel something has disturbed them.#$b#There was a boot print in the dirt, near the pond.#$b#Is Jas, perhaps, playing pranks? No, that does not seem like her.
Entries.Outdoor_4: I awoke at dawn, my mind too busy to permit sleep, and stepped out for a walk.#$b#I caught a glimpse of a dark figure - perhaps a child? - in the fields. They scampered away at the sight of me.#$b#Who do you think they were, @?$2
Entries.funReturn_Jasper: Sorry I am late home, my love. I thought I heard footsteps, and caught a glimpse of something following me.$3#$b#Nevermind, it was probably just a fox.
The stars are so beautiful tonight, @. Will you come out and admire them with me? Bring a blanket for us to snuggle under.$4

Entries.patio_Jasper: I feel blessed, @, to be living on this beautiful farm, with our child on the way.#$b#I feel... complete.$4
Entries.spouseRoom_Jasper: Our child will be here soon, my love. Oh, but I am aflutter with nerves and excitement!$4
Entries.funReturn_Jasper: I was mulling over names for our child on the walk home, @. How do you feel about %name?$1

Entries.Indoor_Day_0: I've been doing some research, and decided to make you this.[212]$3#$b#Wild salmon is packed with omega-3 to help our baby grow healthy and strong.$4
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: Hello my love. You must be exhausted. Would you like a backrub?
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: I rustled up a little something to help with your cravings. [342 194 195 197 233 215]$4#$b#I hope it helps.$3
Entries.spouseRoom_Jasper: $1 Jasper_Emily#Emily suggested I give you this? I am not much into crystal healing. But it can't hurt, can it?[62 66]$k#$e#I found this book on What to Expect... Don't worry, I'm taking lots of notes.$1

Entries.OneKid_0: I so enjoy watching our %kid1 sleep. I wonder what babies dream of?$1
Entries.OneKid_1: %kid1 certainly seems to sleep a lot... I'd thought children would be more... interactive.$2
Entries.OneKid_2: %kid1 is so delicate and tiny. It's scary, isn't it? I'm so worried I might break them.$2
Entries.OneKid_3: I love %kid1, I do. But I must say, I'm not so fond of their nappies!$1#$b#Whoever knew something so tiny could produce so much waste?$2

Entries.OneKid_0: %kid1 gave me the biggest, brightest smile today. Oh, it made my heart melt.$4
Entries.OneKid_1: I've been experimenting with purees for our %kid1. Only the best, organic ingredients, of course!$3
Entries.OneKid_2: It's amazing how fast babies grow, isn't it? Feels like only yesterday %kid1 was a tiny bairn asleep in my arms.$4
Entries.OneKid_3: Our %kid1 is quite the little chatterbox. They seem to be inventing their own language.$1

Entries.OneKid_0: I took %kid1 out to pick flowers yesterday. They wanted you to have this one.[18]$4#$b#Sorry it's a bit crushed.
Entries.OneKid_1: There were ducklings on the pond this morning. I should take %kid1 down to feed them.#$b#Oh, not bread of course! I'm sure we can find some healthy bird snackfood!$1
Entries.OneKid_2: What a glorious day! Perhaps I shall take littke %kid1 out for a walk.#$b#An appreciation of the outdoors is very important.
Entries.OneKid_3: Little %kid1 is such a delight. I can't help but feel we're inventing our own secret language.

Entries.FarmerPregnantJasper: I hear congratulations are in order, @.$1#$b#Oh no, Doctor Harvey didn't tell me; news travels fast in a small town.#$b#Let me know if there's anything you need and I'll see if I can get it for you.#$b#I had the strangest cravings when I was pregnant with Abigail.$2

Caroline told me your happy news! It will be wonderful to have more children around.$1#$b#But do make sure to take some time for yourself now, @, while you still can.#$b#Because once they're here... Well, your life will never be the same again.$2#$b#Not bad, goodness no! Just... different...$2
Your mate told me you're gravid. He seems very excited about it.#$b#Bring your cub here when they're talking, and I'll teach them the sacred art of bombcraft, what do you say?
A child on the way! I'm so happy for you my dear.#$b#Here, this may ease some of the morning nausea. [614]
I hear you're expecting a child, @! Oh yes, Jasper's been crowing it the world.#$b#Congratulations to you both.#$b#And if you need anyone to teach them the sword, feel free to stop by!
Jasper was in here earlier, checking out an armload of parenting books. He takes everything so seriously, our professor.#$b#I'm delighted for you both.
Oh yes my love... I may have told a few people. Just a couple of trusted confidants...#$b#I'm not sure how it got spread around the entire town...$2
Your husband's been in and out, asking me questions all day! He certainly is enthusiastic.$1#$b#Make sure to eat well, get plenty of sleep and keep up light exercise, and all will go smoothly.$3

Entries.NPC.cs.4448: My love, I still cannot believe that I'm going to be a father.$l
Entries.NPC.cs.4449: Being a parent is exhausting... I don't have the energy to get up.$s
Entries.NPC.cs.4452: I'm working on a very important dissertation. Why can't you look after the kids for once?$a
Entries.NPC.cs.4455: I was going to make you breakfast, but I had an epiphany of inspiration.$a

And thank you, for saving my life.$4"/pause 500/faceDirection Jasper 2/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/speak Jasper "We should go, @, and permit Dwarf the privacy they require.$2"/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection Jasper 3/speak Dwarf "No, Jasper Thomas, you don't understand."/jump Jasper 3/faceDirection Jasper 1/pause 500/speak Dwarf "I can't teach you... because I don't know myself."/emote Jasper 16 true/emote farmer 16 true/speak Dwarf "My sire told tales of the father and the mother - the sun and the earth.#$b#Of the shadowkin in the deep and the elemental wars. They taught me how to make bombs, how to cook. And who not to trust.#$b#But everything I know, everything I remember, it's all jumbled and confused.#$b#And now they are gone. I took your notes because I hoped they'd help me learn who I really was, but..."/pause 500/speak Jasper "...They were just chicken scratches on paper?$2"/pause 500/emote Dwarf 60/speak Dwarf "I was hoping, perhaps, that you could teach me, Jasper Thomas. As you teach the human cubs.#$b#That maybe we could learn the secrets of the dwarves... together?"/pause 500/emote Dwarf 28/pause 500/emote Jasper 16/speak Dwarf "And you could, perhaps, not share them with the world."/emote Jasper 32/speak Jasper "It would be my pleasure."/pause 500/emote Dwarf 32/pause 500/message "Jasper could be some time.
